articles.description: The highly rumoured next instalment in the GTA franchise has finally been confirmed Rockstar North. Here’s everything we know so far
articles.content: Since its release in 2013, Grand Theft Auto V has become one of the most successful media properties of all time. Part of that success comes is thanks to its many rereleases on next generation hardwa… [+2801 chars]
